actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the acquisition of certain lands within the Mark Twain National Forest, and for other purposes.
short_title: Greer Spring Acquisition and Protection Act of 1990

summary.text: Greer Spring Acquisition and Protection Act of 1990 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire, under certain conditions, fee title to Greer Spring, Missouri, for addition to the Mark Twain National Forest.

titles.title: Greer Spring Acquisition and Protection Act of 1990
A bill to provide for the acquisition of certain lands within the Mark Twain National Forest, and for other purposes.
